title: Line Mechanic roles available in Rotorua, Hastings and Dunedin
description:
Unison Contracting Services Ltd
 - one of New Zealand's largest electrical distribution contractors, has recently expanded its operations and is looking for experienced Line Mechanics to join tour team and manage their rapid growth. We have positions available in Rotorua, Hastings, Taupo and Dunedin.
If you are interested in developing your career further with a company that is truly committed to growing a diverse and inclusive workforce, please read on.
We are currently looking to hire experienced line mechanics in all our regions.  With safety as our top priority you'll be working to industry best practices with modern tools and equipment.
As well as competitive rates of pay we also value career development and how we can ensure our employees are engaged and empowered. At Unison, you will always feel like your voice is being heard.
To be successful in this position you will need:
 
A current New Zealand Electrical Registration as a Line Mechanic
Experience working on lines up to and including 33kV
Be 100% committed to Safe Working Practices
Experience erecting poles both wooden and concrete
Experience fault-finding on overhead equipment
Excellent communication skills, interpersonal skills and a team player approach
Available for standby roster and working away from home if required
At Unison we will provide:
 
A safe and enjoyable workplace, where safety and wellbeing are our top priority
Permanent positions with competitive remuneration package
Life, trauma and income protection insurance
$200 per year Wellbeing subsidy
Onsite gym
Opportunity for overtime and allowances
Modern tools & equipment
Ongoing training and development
Never has there been a more exciting time to be part of the distribution industry. If you are keen to apply please follow the link below.  In your cover letter, please state which region is of interest to you.
Unison is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We also understand that great performance comes from great people. As a valued team member, you will receive ongoing training and development as well as a host of benefits including great remuneration, health insurance, and subsidies to enjoy an active and healthy lifestyle.
